desc.p: This fields holds the permission ID.
Valid Customer(s) for whom the permission is applicable
Description of Permission of the record held in CHANNEL.PERMISSION
Defines the type of permission.Individual type for Personal user and group type for Corporate or Intermediary user.
Product which belongs to the selected AA Product Group for the selected customer
Should be a valid record in AA.PRODUCT
Indicates the type of permission applicable for products which is defined in the associated PRODUCT field
To list the available products based on the selected AA Product group and customer.
AA Product Groups for customer which is accesible for the selected customer.
Should be a valid record in AA.PRODUCT.GROUP
Indicates the type of permission applicable for AA Product groups defined in associated Product Group field
Valid Customer for whom the permissions defined from the associated set of fields.
